channel.title: [RESOLVED - ADDED]Update the irc client: here's why
channel.description:
The irc client on the site currently is ugly and archaic. If a more modern irc client was introduced, it would potentially increase the population on moparscape related channels. This would aid in the efforts of the `J-Team` and overall effort to spread accurate knowledge of programming and the rs2 protocol.
A client that comes to mind is: https://kiwiirc.com/

item.title: [RESOLVED - ADDED]Update the irc client: here's why
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

I just posted the same thing I guess. So my answer is:

Yes
Yes
Yes
Yes
Yes
Yes
Ye
YeS
No <- fuck you, I said YES.

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - ADDED]Update the irc client: here's why

item.title: [RESOLVED - ADDED]Update the irc client: here's why
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:12, topic:538221”]Just feel like bring this back up for more discussion.

I must say KiwiIRC looks pretty nice and not as dated as the current one.

The wiki definitely needs to be fixed, along with more incentives for people to add information. For some reason, people just don’t really do things to “help” (although we are better at being altruistic with our knowledge than the other communities)

As for incentives what could they give to get people to give information? inb4badge.[/quote]

Badge

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - ADDED]Update the irc client: here's why
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:7, topic:538221”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=657048.msg4395760#msg4395760 date=1389062384]
Pretty sure MITB said he wanted to but had some requirements for any new one we used. Can’t remember what they were but this idea was definitely already suggested
[/quote]
He’s alive and on #mopardev, don’t know if that was implied.[/quote]Was referring to the IRC client

Read full topic
